title: Unable to launch client....
body:
Hey friends. Jumped on my comp tonight and went to play some League. Client launched and began scanning files. Looked like just a new update. Got to the end and an error popped up: 

"Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information." 

There is a "Retry" button under that but I can click it a hundred times and it just flashes backup again. I don't know how to resolve this or HOW to check the logs (or even how to interpret what they say!). Has anyone else had this happen or have any insight? I have a screen shot I will try to post just for a visual. 

Any help would be greatly appreciated!

replies.body: The specific issue causing this can vary depending on when the error occurred.  At 33 percent, the patcher is trying to connect to the patching server to grab updates but is failing.  You should go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot your network.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Same issue, never had this happen before.
same thing happend to me what is a fix?????

[IMG]http://i68.tinypic.com/346q9f5.png[/IMG] 

Here is a pic of the error/issue!
